languages.text: "Облеченный законной властью еретик, о последних деяниях которого никому ничего не известно... поверьте мне, {name}, такое лицо, как Мастер шепотов, не ограничится посылкой хаос-артефакта в своем стремлении дестабилизировать ваш протекторат".

traits.locale_text: "Облеченный законной властью еретик, о последних деяниях никому ничего не известно... поверьте мне, {name}, такое лицо, как Мастер шепотов, не ограничится посылкой хаос-артефакта в своем стремлении дестабилизировать ваш протекторат".

languages.text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Облеченный законной властью еретик, о последних деяниях которого никому ничего не известно... поверьте мне, {name}, такое лицо, как Мастер шепотов, не ограничится посылкой хаос-артефакта в своем стремлении дестабилизировать ваш протекторат".

traits.locale_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to unbalance your protectorate."

"A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to unbalance your protectorate."

"A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

"A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

"A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

languages.text: 「正当な権力を持ち、最近の活動が誰にも謎のままの異端者…信じてくれ、{name}よ、元囁きの主のような人物は、あなたの保護領を不安定にしようと、渾沌のアーティファクトを送り込むだけでは止まらない」
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「正当な権力を持ち、最新の活動が誰にも謎のままの異端者…信じてくれ、{name}よ、”元”囁きの主のような人物は、あなたの保護領を不安定にしようと、渾沌のアーチファクトを送り込むだけでは止まらない」

languages.text: « Un hérétique doté d'une autorité légitime et dont les dernières activités restent obscures... Croyez-moi, {name}, un individu tel que votre ancien maître des murmures ne se bornera pas à envoyer un artefact du Chaos pour déstabiliser votre protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Un hérétique doté d'une autorité légitime et dont les dernières activités restent obscures... Croyez-moi, {name}, un individu tel que votre ancien maître des murmures ne se bornera pas à envoyer un artefact du Chaos pour déstabiliser votre protectorat. »

languages.text: “昆拉德那个异端分子谎称拥有合法的权力，他最近的行踪也无人知晓……相信我，{name}，像前任低语之主那样的人，肯定不会仅仅送一件混沌造物就结束了。他肯定会利用各种各样的手段，进一步破坏王朝的稳定。”
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “昆拉德那个异端分子谎称拥有合法的权力，他最近的行踪也无人知晓……相信我，{name}，像前任低语之主那样的人，肯定不会仅仅送一件混沌造物就结束了。他肯定会利用各种各样的手段，进一步破坏王朝的稳定。”

languages.text: «Un hereje con poderes legítimos y cuyas últimas actividades siguen siendo un misterio para todos... Créame, {name}: con tal de desestabilizar su protectorado, un artefacto del Caos no bastará para frenar a un individuo como su antiguo maestro de susurros».
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «Un hereje con poderes legítimos y cuyas últimas actividades siguen siendo un misterio para todos... Créame, {name}: con tal de desestabilizar su protectorado, un artefacto del Caos no bastará para frenar a un individuo como su antiguo maestro de susurros».

languages.text: "Ein Ketzer, der legitime Macht besitzt und dessen jüngste Aktivitäten alle vor ein Rätsel stellen ... Glaubt mir, {name}, jemand wie Euer ehemaliger Meister des Geflüsters wird nicht davor zurückschrecken, ein Chaosartefakt zu schicken, um Euer Protektorat zu destabilisieren."
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Ketzer, der legitime Macht besitzt und dessen jüngste Aktivitäten alle vor ein Rätsel stellen ... Glaubt mir, {name}, jemand wie Euer ehemaliger Meister des Geflüsters wird nicht davor zurückschrecken, ein Chaosartefakt zu schicken, um Euer Protektorat zu destabilisieren."

languages.text: "Yasal güç elde etmiş, son dönem faaliyetleri herkes için bir gizem olan bir kâfir. İnan bana {name}, eski Fısıltı Üstadı'nın protektoranda dengeyi bozmak için sadece Kaos eseri yollamakla kalmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "A heretic who is vested with legitimate power and whose latest activities remain a mystery to all... Believe me, {name}, an individual like your former Master of Whispers will not stop at sending a Chaos artefact in his attempts to destabilise your protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Yasal güç elde etmiş ve son dönem faaliyetleri herkes için bir gizem olan bir kâfir. İnanın bana {name}, eski Fısıltı Üstadı'nızın protektoranızın dengesini bozmak adına yapacağı tek şey size bir Kaos eseri yollamak olmayacak."
